objects.description: [Black Basta](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1070) can check system flags and libraries, process timing, and API's to detect code emulation or sandboxing.(Citation: Palo Alto Networks Black Basta August 2022)(Citation: Check Point Black Basta October 2022)
